title: Neapolitan marshmallows
ingredients: ['1 sachet Dr Oetker® Egg White Powder (or 2 medium egg whites)', '5 leaves Dr Oetker® Select Fine Leaf Gelatine', '100g (3 1/2 oz) granulated sugar', '50g (2 oz) Dr Oetker® Liquid Glucose', '1 teaspoon Dr Oetker® Natural Vanilla Extract', '25g (1 oz) cornflour', 'Dr Oetker® Bright Red Gel Food Colour', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder']
